snippet: The British beverage company Britvic said on Wednesday that it was in talks with A.G. Barr over a potential merger worth around $2.2 billion, a deal that would create one of Europe's largest soft drink companies.
abstract: The British beverage company Britvic said on Wednesday that it was in talks with A.G. Barr over a potential merger worth around $2.2 billion, a deal that would create one of Europe's largest soft drink companies.

headline.main: British Soft Drink Companies in Merger Talks
